TextBlock.Text: CASSAVA: Of note: water appears to temporarily neutralize the deadly matter as the tide washes up onto this island.
CASSAVA: An update: disturbingly, the deadly matter appears able to penetrate any surface.. The only exception to this property appears to be water, which completely neutralizes its advance.
CASSAVA: If this hypothesis is true... Is that how I alone was able to survive whatever happened?
CASSAVA: ..I must focus on my research. There is another property of this exotic deadly matter I have noticed that I must investigate further on <color=lightblue>Timber Hearth.</color>
